Row.Text: [ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Food] Food and +2 [ICON_Housing] Housing in Cities with at least 2 [ICON_District] Specialty Districts.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 2 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+50% [ICON_Production] Production towards Encampments and their Buildings.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 1 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+50% [ICON_Production] Production towards [ICON_DISTRICT_HARBOR] Harbors and their [ICON_Buildings] Buildings.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 1 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Resource_Horses] Horse and [ICON_Resource_Iron] Iron extracted from their respective Resource tiles.
[ICON_Bullet]+7 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength and [ICON_Ranged] Ranged Strength in Cities with [ICON_Buildings] Walls.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 1 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+100% [ICON_Production] Production towards all City [ICON_Buildings] Walls.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 1 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+100% [ICON_Science] Science adjacency for the [ICON_DISTRICT_CAMPUS] Campus.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 1 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+100% [ICON_Faith] Faith adjacency for the [ICON_DISTRICT_HOLYSITE] Holy Site.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 1 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Governor] Governors add +1 [ICON_PressureUp] Loyalty to a City per [ICON_Promotion] Promotion.
[ICON_Bullet]+10 [ICON_Resource_Iron] Iron per turn.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 1 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+10 [ICON_Resource_Horses] Horses per turn.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 1 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_Science] Science, [ICON_Culture] Culture, and [ICON_Faith] Faith, as well as +4 [ICON_Gold] Gold from City-State Suzerainty.

[ICON_Bullet]+50% [ICON_Production] Production towards [ICON_Buildings] Granary.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+3 [ICON_Food] Food in Granary.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 2 [ICON_Gold] Gold.

[ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Production] Production in all Cities and City Maintenance increases by 1 [ICON_Gold] Gold; bonus +2 [ICON_Production] Production and City Maintenance increases by 1 [ICON_Gold] Gold in Cities with 2 [ICON_District] Specialty Districts.

[ICON_Bullet]+5 [ICON_Science] Science, [ICON_Culture] Culture, and [ICON_Production] Production in the [ICON_Capital] Capital.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Cities within 6 tiles of the [ICON_Capital] Capital gain +5% [ICON_Science] Science, [ICON_Culture] Culture, and [ICON_Production] Production.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Cities beyond 9 tiles of the [ICON_Capital] Capital suffer -50% [ICON_Science] Science, [ICON_Culture] Culture, and [ICON_Production] Production.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]-75% [ICON_Production] Production and [ICON_Gold] Gold penalty towards [ICON_Unit] Settlers.
[ICON_Bullet]+4 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength for [ICON_Unit] Units that are within 6 tiles of the [ICON_Capital] Capital.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]-3 [ICON_Gold] Gold in [ICON_Capital] Capital.
[ICON_Bullet]+5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength for [ICON_Unit] Land Melee class Units when defending against ranged attacks.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 2 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+4 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength for [ICON_Unit] Land Anti-Cavalry class Units when defending.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 3 [ICON_Gold] Gold.

[ICON_Bullet]+4 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength for [ICON_Unit] Land Ranged class Units when defending, or attacking enemies on [ICON_Terrain] Hills.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 3 [ICON_Gold] Gold.

[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Land Recon class Units can enter foreign borders.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Land Recon class Units can auto explore in foreign borders without repercussions, but manually moving less than three tiles will trigger a prompt for surprise war.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Envoy] Envoy token point per turn.
[ICON_Bullet]+14 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength for [ICON_Unit] Land Recon class Units when defending.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 2 [ICON_Gold] Gold.

[ICON_Bullet]+4 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength against players in a [ICON_GLORY_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age or [ICON_GLORY_SUPER_GOLDEN_AGE] Heroic Age and Free Cities.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 1 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet][ICON_Unit] Ranged Cavalry class Units can move after attacking.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]City Maintenance increases by 2 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity per [ICON_Religion] Religion present in a City.
